footer.description: Built with Vue 3 + Vuetify | Supports UDDF Format Dive Logs

upload.title: Upload Files
upload.description: Please upload your dive log (UDDF format) and video file first, then proceed to the workspace for timeline alignment and overlay processing

diveLog.title: Upload Dive Log
diveLog.selectText: or click the button below to select file
diveLog.error: Please upload a UDDF format file (.uddf)

video.title: Upload Video
video.formats: Supported formats: MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV
video.error: Please upload a supported video format (MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV)

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.description: View dive data charts, play videos, and adjust timeline synchronization settings here

warning.title: Please Upload Files First
warning.description: Please upload your dive log (UDDF format) and video file on the 'Upload Files' page first, then return to this workspace

export.hint: Please adjust timeline synchronization settings before exporting

video.title: Video Player
video.noVideo: Please upload a video file first

sync.title: Timeline Synchronization
sync.hint: Drag the 'Timeline Offset' slider to align the video start point with the dive log
sync.noData: Please upload dive log and video first
